academic.name: Université libre de Bruxelles (ULB)
academic.description: Home institution and coordinator of the FOI Research Group, based at CEPAP (Centre d'Étude des Politiques et de l'Administration Publique).

academic.name: University of Lausanne
academic.description: Partner in comparative FOI research, contributing expertise on Swiss transparency legislation and administrative responsiveness.

academic.name: University of Bucharest
academic.description: Collaborating on the extension of TRANSACT methodology to Romania, expanding comparative evidence on FOI implementation in Eastern Europe.

academic.name: Wits University
academic.description: Key partner for extending FOI field experiments to the African continent, studying transparency under the Promotion of Access to Information Act.

academic.name: Makerere University
academic.description: Collaborating on FOI research in East Africa, examining the implementation of access to information legislation in Uganda.

academic.name: Università di Napoli L'Orientale
academic.description: Partner in quantitative public policy research, contributing expertise in economic analysis and evaluation of transparency policies.

academic.name: Johannes Kepler University Linz
academic.description: Academic partner contributing comparative perspectives on FOI implementation in the Austrian and broader German-speaking context.

academic.name: University of Genoa
academic.description: Collaborating on research methodology and comparative analysis of transparency policies across Southern European institutions.

civil_society.name: Transparencia.be / Anticor Belgique
civil_society.description: Belgium’s national FOI platform, providing the dataset of 4,266 citizen requests analysed in our computational text analysis research.

civil_society.name: Access Info Europe / AskTheEU.org
civil_society.description: European transparency advocacy organisation operating AskTheEU.org, the platform for FOI requests to EU institutions.

civil_society.name: mySociety (WhatDoTheyKnow.com)
civil_society.description: UK-based civic technology organisation operating WhatDoTheyKnow.com, one of the world’s largest FOI request platforms.

civil_society.name: Loitransparence.ch
civil_society.description: Swiss transparency platform supporting citizens in exercising their right to access government information under Swiss FOI law.

civil_society.name: Ma Dada
civil_society.description: French civic technology platform facilitating FOI requests to public administrations, promoting transparency and open government in France.
